job_description:
Hello 

I hope you are doing well 
Contact Opportunity

Position - Front End Developer 
Skills - 7 years of experience in Java, full-stack, C#, .NET, Cypress API, , AWS, Spring Boot, 

Exp - 9 + Year 
Location - Atlanta GA (please Share Local Profiles Only for In Person Interview)

If Anybody have Good Profile, Please Share me at - bavita@Smartitframe.com
ai_prompt:
You are a professional job application assistant. Based on the job description and resume provided, generate a compelling email to the recruiter.

Please provide:
1. A concise, professional subject line
2. A personalized email body that:
   - Expresses genuine interest in the position
   - Highlights relevant skills and experience from the resume that match the job description
   - Demonstrates knowledge of the role
   - Includes a clear call to action
   - Maintains a professional yet personable tone
3. Body should start with for which position I am reaching out for. then what are my skills from jd that I have in bullet points style. lastly find my attached resume like closing statement.
4. If the jd mentioned recuriter name, start with Hello [recruiter name], else start with just Hello,
Do not send subject line in body.

Format your response as JSON with two fields: "subject" and "body".

Subject should be
Application for [role name] (Location).

Signature at end of email should be.
Best regards,
Sai Charan Teratipally
tcharan.tech@gmail.com
+1 (940) 277-2434


Example response:

I hope you‚Äôre doing well.

I‚Äôm writing to express my interest in the Full Stack Developer (Banking Domain) position located in Brooklyn, OH. I‚Äôm local to Ohio and available for onsite work as required.

I have over 9 years of experience designing and developing enterprise applications within the banking and financial services domain, with expertise in Java, Spring Boot, Microservices, React, and REST APIs. My background includes working on secure transaction systems, customer portals, and real-time data processing solutions using Agile and CI/CD practices.

Please find my updated resume attached for your review. I‚Äôd be glad to discuss how my skills and domain experience align with your client‚Äôs needs.
email_subject: Application for Front End Developer (Atlanta GA)
email_body:
Hello,

I am writing to express my interest in the Front End Developer position located in Atlanta, GA. Based on the job description provided, I believe my skills and experience align well with the requirements:
- 7 years of experience in Java, full-stack development, C#, .NET, Cypress, API, AWS, and Spring Boot

I have over 9 years of experience in the software development field, with a strong background in Java and full-stack technologies. I am confident in my ability to contribute effectively to your team.

Please find my attached resume for your review. I look forward to the opportunity to discuss how my qualifications match the needs of the role.

Best regards,
Sai Charan Teratipally
tcharan.tech@gmail.com
+1 (940) 277-2434

job_description:
üåü We‚Äôre Hiring: React.js Developer | Dallas, TX (Onsite, 5 Days/Week) üåü
Local Preferd 
Contract- C2C/W2
Visa- All visas work(GC/GCEAD Only for W2)
Exp- 12+ YRS
 We‚Äôre looking for a React.js Developer with strong Java proficiency to join our growing team in Dallas, TX ‚Äî onsite all 5 days!
üîß Key Responsibilities
Develop and maintain responsive, high-performance web applications using React.js
Design and implement reusable UI components and frontend libraries
Collaborate with UI/UX designers, backend developers, and project managers for seamless integration
Optimize applications for speed, scalability, and cross-browser compatibility
Integrate RESTful APIs and third-party libraries
Write clean, modular, and well-documented code (JavaScript, JSX, HTML, CSS)
Debug, troubleshoot, and resolve technical issues
Participate in code reviews and contribute to team discussions
Stay current with emerging trends in React and the JavaScript ecosystem
üß† Required Skills
Strong proficiency in React.js, Redux or Context API
Solid knowledge of JavaScript (ES6+), HTML5, and CSS3
Understanding of RESTful APIs, OOP, and design patterns
Experience with Git and version control workflows
Familiarity with testing frameworks (Jest, React Testing Library preferred)
Excellent problem-solving and communication skills
Hands-on experience with Java is a strong plus!

Please share candidate profiles at Rishabh.k0251@gmail.com
